0 00 0000000 000 010
Load RAM[2]
1 11 0101010 001 000
Set M=0 with no jump
0 00 0000000 000 001
Load RAM[1]
1 11 1110000 010 000
Set D=M with no jump
0 00 0000000 010 000
Load RAM[16]
1 11 0001100 000 010
Jump to RAM[16] if D equal 0
0 00 0000000 000 010
Load RAM[2]
1 11 1110000 010 000
Set D=M with no jump
0 00 0000000 000 000
Load RAM[0]
1 11 1000010 010 000
Set D=D+M with no jump
0 00 0000000 000 010
Load RAM[2]
1 11 0001100 001 000
Set M=D with no jump
0 00 0000000 000 001
Load RAM[1]
1 11 1110010 001 000
Set M=M-1 with no jump
0 00 0000000 000 010
Load RAM[2]
1 11 0101010 000 111
Jump with 0
0 00 0000000 010 000
Load RAM[16]
1 11 0101010 000 111
Jump with 0
